familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president of TNGC Pine Hill LLC (F/K/A Crest Court LLC) (Trump National Golf Club - Philadelphia), in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests.

familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president/chairman/director of TNGC Pine Hill Member Corp. (F/K/A Crest Court Member Court), in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
